@graph.caption: Cups of pudding topped with chocolate cookie crumbs and gummy worms to look like dirt.

@graph.name: Easy Chocolate Dirt Pie Cups (With Variations!) - On My Kids Plate
@graph.description: This easy chocolate dirt pie recipe is made in cups with pudding and looks like real dirt! Top with gummy worms for extra fun.

itemListElement.name: Easy Chocolate Dirt Pie Cups (With Variations!)

@graph.headline: Easy Chocolate Dirt Pie Cups (With Variations!)

@graph.name: Easy Chocolate Dirt Pie Cups
@graph.description: These super easy chocolate dirt pie cups are made with Oreo Cookies, chocolate pudding and gummy worms. Kids love these easy and super fun treats!
recipeIngredient: 2 boxes Instant chocolate pudding mix (3.4 oz instant chocolate pudding mix)
8 ounces Whipped topping (Can also use whipped cream. Soften on the counter if frozen.)
24  Gummy worms (3-5 gummy worms per cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Put cold milk and pudding in a large bowl. Mix with a whisk until fully dissolves.
recipeInstructions.name: Put cold milk and pudding in a large bowl. Mix with a whisk until fully dissolves.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the pudding in the refrigerator for about 10 minutes, or until it begins to thicken and set just a little.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the pudding in the refrigerator for about 10 minutes, or until it begins to thicken and set just a little.

recipeInstructions.text: Fold in softened whipped topping into the chocolate pudding, mixing well.
recipeInstructions.name: Fold in softened whipped topping into the chocolate pudding, mixing well.

recipeInstructions.text: Layer the pudding evenly between the cups. Place in the refrigerator for 20 minutes to chill and set further.
recipeInstructions.name: Layer the pudding evenly between the cups. Place in the refrigerator for 20 minutes to chill and set further.

recipeInstructions.text: Crush cookies in a zip top bag. Use your hands, a rolling pin or even a heavy canned food item to gently roll over and crush the cookies.
recipeInstructions.name: Crush cookies in a zip top bag. Use your hands, a rolling pin or even a heavy canned food item to gently roll over and crush the cookies.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle cookies on top of each dirt pie cup evenly. Add gummy worms to decorate and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle cookies on top of each dirt pie cup evenly. Add gummy worms to decorate and enjoy!
